## Project Overview

This is a Next.js application demonstrating Tailwind CSS theme usage with custom color palettes.

## Key Features

- Custom theme colors (Primary, Secondary, Accent) with full shade ranges
- ThemeButton component showcasing theme color usage
- ColorShowcase component displaying all theme colors
- TypeScript support throughout

## Running the App

```bash
npm run dev    # Start development server (http://localhost:3000)
npm run build  # Build for production
npm start      # Run production build
```

## Theme Usage

Custom colors are defined in tailwind.config.ts and can be used like:
- `bg-primary-500` for backgrounds
- `text-secondary-700` for text
- `border-accent-600` for borders
